About   Academics   Events             People   Games   Blog                   About   Academics   Events   Faculty   Students   Games   Blog                      Search                                                                             Search                                          Prison Escape   A cooperative card game of betrayal and resource management.      Earn cigarettes by collaborating to dig through various prison obstacles in order to escape. Only the prisoner playing the best digging tool card gets the most cigarettes, and the escapee with the most cigarettes wins the game.
